remarks: Properties that determine an Abelian group.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Aug-2013.)
statement:
isabld.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` G ) ) $.
isabld.p $e |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` G ) ) $.
isabld.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
isabld.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B /\ y e. B ) -> ( x .+ y ) = ( y .+ x ) ) $.
isabld $p |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d ph x y $.
